name: Mesus VS The Broman Empire
description:
Mesus VS The Broman Empire

Small game I made for Ludum Dare 40, jamming with some of my friends (domi (@domi) , Alex William (@alex-william), and frmartins (@frmartins)).

In this game you must rescue your people from the evil bromans, who are the no-clipping evil beings that enslaved your people!

Use wasd or arrow keys to move, and click to throw fish.

FAQ

Throw fish to attract your followers to its location, they prefer to go to the fish rather than you, but they can see it only as far as they can see you.

The point on the theme was “the more followers you have, the worse it is (to navigate)”, while the Bromans can trample through your followers, they pose an obstacle to your navigation.

The objective is to free as many followers as you can before you get caught, post your high-scores on the comments if you will. It’s a jam game so we made something more arcade-y.
